class="excerpt"><div class="rm-Markdown markdown-body" data-testid="RDMD"><p>Learn how to upgrade your Notion API integrations to the latest API version</p></div></div></div><div class="col-xs-3"><a class="SuggestEdituoSX2zdYKItO suggestEdits rm-SuggestEdit" rel="nofollow" href="/edit/upgrade-guide-2025-09-03"><i aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-edit"></i>Suggest Edits</a></div></div></header><div class="grid-container-fluid" id="content-container"><section class="content-body grid-75 "><div dehydrated="&lt;p&gt;We‚Äôve released &lt;strong&gt;Notion API version &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025‚Äë09‚Äë03&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;, introducing first-class support for multi-source databases. This enables a single database to contain multiple linked data sources ‚Äî unlocking powerful new workflows. &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;For more information about data sources, see &lt;a href=&quot;https://developers.notion.com/docs/upgrade-faqs-2025-09-03&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;our FAQs.&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;However, this change is not backwards-compatible.&lt;/strong&gt; Most existing database integrations must be updated to prevent disruptions.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;blockquote class=&quot;callout callout_error&quot; theme=&quot;‚ùóÔ∏è&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=&quot;callout-heading&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;callout-icon&quot;&gt;‚ùóÔ∏è&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;Code changes required&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p&gt;If your integration is still using a previous API version and a user adds another data source to a database, &lt;strong&gt;the following API actions will fail:&lt;/strong&gt; &lt;/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Create page when using the database as the parent&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Database read, write, or query&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Writing relation properties that point to that database&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;
&lt;h1 class=&quot;heading heading-1 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;whats-changing&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-whats-changing&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;What‚Äôs changing&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to What‚Äôs changing&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#whats-changing&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h1&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Most API operations that used &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt; now require a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Several database endpoints have moved or been restructured to support the new data model&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h1 class=&quot;heading heading-1 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;what-this-guide-covers&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-what-this-guide-covers&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;What this guide covers&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to What this guide covers&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#what-this-guide-covers&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h1&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;A breakdown of what‚Äôs new and why it changed&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;A step-by-step migration checklist to safely update your integrations&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h1 class=&quot;heading heading-1 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;upgrade-checklist&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-upgrade-checklist&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Upgrade checklist&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Upgrade checklist&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#upgrade-checklist&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h1&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Use this checklist to see exactly what must change before you bump Notion-Version to &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025-09-03&lt;/code&gt;. &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;required-steps-across-all-of-your-integrations&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-required-steps-across-all-of-your-integrations&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Required steps across all of your integrations&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Required steps across all of your integrations&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#required-steps-across-all-of-your-integrations&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;ol&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Add a discovery step to fetch and store the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; to use in subsequent API calls.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Start sending &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; when creating pages or defining relations&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Migrate database endpoints to data sources.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;If you use the Search API, update result handling to process data source objects and possible multiple results per database&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;If using the TypeScript SDK, upgrade to the correct version and set the new version in your client&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;If using webhooks, handle the new shape and bump your subscription version&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ol&gt;
&lt;blockquote class=&quot;callout callout_info&quot; theme=&quot;üìò&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=&quot;callout-heading&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;callout-icon&quot;&gt;üìò&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;Developer action required&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p&gt;These steps primarily require code changes in your repositories or low-code platform. They cannot be fully completed through the Notion integration management UI.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;
&lt;h1 class=&quot;heading heading-1 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;step-by-step-guide&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-step-by-step-guide&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Step-by-step guide&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Step-by-step guide&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#step-by-step-guide&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h1&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;step-1-add-a-discovery-step-to-fetch-and-store-the-data_source_id&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-step-1-add-a-discovery-step-to-fetch-and-store-the-data-source-id&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Step 1: Add a discovery step to fetch and store the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Step 1: Add a discovery step to fetch and store the &quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#step-1-add-a-discovery-step-to-fetch-and-store-the-data_source_id&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;p&gt;First, identify the parts of your system that process database IDs. These may include:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Responses of list and search APIs, e.g. &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/search&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Search&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Database IDs provided directly by users of your system, or hard-coded based on URLs in the Notion app.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Events for integration webhooks (covered in the &lt;strong&gt;Webhook changes&lt;/strong&gt; section below).&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;p&gt;For each entry point that uses database IDs, start your migration process by introducing an API call to the new &lt;strong&gt;Get Database API&lt;/strong&gt; (&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;GET /v1/databases/:database_id&lt;/code&gt;) endpoint to retrieve a list of child &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_sources&lt;/code&gt;. For this new call, make sure to use the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025-09-03&lt;/code&gt; version in the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;Notion-Version&lt;/code&gt; header, even if the rest of your API calls haven&amp;#x27;t been updated yet.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Get Database (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Get Database (JS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Get Database (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// GET /v1/databases/{database_id}
// Notion-Version: &amp;quot;2025-09-03&amp;quot;
// --- RETURNS --&amp;gt;
{
  &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;database&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;{database_id}&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;title&amp;quot;: [/* ... */],
  &amp;quot;parent&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;255104cd-477e-808c-b279-d39ab803a7d2&amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;quot;is_inline&amp;quot;: false,
  &amp;quot;in_trash&amp;quot;: false,
  &amp;quot;created_time&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2025-08-07T10:11:07.504-07:00&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;last_edited_time&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2025-08-10T15:53:11.386-07:00&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;data_sources&amp;quot;: [
    {
      &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;{data_source_id}&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;name&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;My Task Tracker&amp;quot;
    }
  ],
  &amp;quot;icon&amp;quot;: null,
  &amp;quot;cover&amp;quot;: null,
  // ...
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Get Database (JS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;let notion = new Client({
  auth: &amp;quot;{ACCESS_TOKEN}&amp;quot;,
  notionVersion: &amp;quot;2025-09-03&amp;quot;,
})

const DATABASE_ID = &amp;quot;/* ... */&amp;quot;
 
try {
  const response = await notion.request({
    method: &amp;quot;get&amp;quot;,
    path: `databases/${DATABASE_ID}`,
  })
  const dataSources = response.data_sources

  // [{ id: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;, name: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot; }, ...]
  console.log(dataSources)

  // In the existing, single-source database case, there will only
  // be one data source.
  const dataSource = dataSources[0]
} catch (error) {
  // Handle `APIResponseError`
  console.error(error)
}

// ... Remaining code, not migrated yet.

notion = new Client({
  auth: &amp;quot;{ACCESS_TOKEN}&amp;quot;,
  notionVersion: &amp;quot;2022-06-28&amp;quot;,
})

// ...
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;To get a data source ID in the Notion app, the settings menu for a database includes a &amp;quot;Copy data source ID&amp;quot; button under &amp;quot;Manage data sources&amp;quot;:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;span aria-label=&quot;&quot; class=&quot;img lightbox closed&quot; role=&quot;button&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;lightbox-inner&quot;&gt;&lt;img alt=&quot;&quot; loading=&quot;lazy&quot; src=&quot;https://files.readme.io/f2d0303a35d08c014d2ed7a171994fe410a8bd5a5b47706fe4b340a161d38c20-image.png&quot; align=&quot;center&quot; class=&quot;border&quot; width=&quot;300px&quot; caption=&quot;&quot; height=&quot;auto&quot; title=&quot;&quot;/&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Having access to the data source ID (or rather, &lt;em&gt;IDs&lt;/em&gt;, once Notion users start adding 2nd sources for their existing databases) for a database lets you continue onto the next few steps.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;step-2-provide-data-source-ids-when-creating-pages-or-relations&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-step-2-provide-data-source-i-ds-when-creating-pages-or-relations&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Step 2: Provide data source IDs when creating pages or relations&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Step 2: Provide data source IDs when creating pages or relations&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#step-2-provide-data-source-ids-when-creating-pages-or-relations&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Some APIs that accept &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt; in the body parameters now support providing a specific &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; instead. This works for any API version, meaning you can switch over at your convenience, before or after upgrading these API requests to use &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025-09-03&lt;/code&gt;:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Creating a page with a database (now: data source) parent&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Defining a database relation property that points to another database (now: data source)&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;create-page&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-create-page&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Create page&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Create page&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#create-page&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;In the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/post-page&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Create a page&lt;/a&gt; API, look for calls that look like this:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Create Page (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Create Page (TS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Create Page (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// POST /v1/pages
{
  &amp;quot;parent&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;database_id&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;database_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;
  }
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Create Page (TS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;const response = await notion.pages.create({
  parent: {
    type: &amp;quot;database_id&amp;quot;,
    database_id: DATABASE_ID,
  }
})
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Change these to use &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; parents instead, using the code from Step 1 to get the ID of a database&amp;#x27;s data source:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Create Page (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Create Page (TS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Create Page (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// POST /v1/pages
{
  &amp;quot;parent&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;data_source_id&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;data_source_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;
  }
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Create Page (TS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// Get dataSource from Step 1

const response = await notion.request({
  method: &amp;quot;post&amp;quot;,
  path: &amp;quot;pages&amp;quot;,
  body: {
    parent: {
      type: &amp;quot;data_source_id&amp;quot;,
      data_source_id: dataSource.id,
    },
  }
})
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;create-or-update-database&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-create-or-update-database&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Create or update database&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Create or update database&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#create-or-update-database&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;For &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/property-object#relation&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;database relation properties&lt;/a&gt;, the API will include both a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; fields in the read path instead of just a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;In the write path, switch your integration to only provide the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; in request objects.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Relation property response example&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Relation property response example&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&amp;quot;Projects&amp;quot;: {
  &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;~pex&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;name&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Projects&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;database_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;6c4240a9-a3ce-413e-9fd0-8a51a4d0a49b&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;data_source_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;a42a62ed-9b51-4b98-9dea-ea6d091bc508&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;dual_property&amp;quot;: {
      &amp;quot;synced_property_name&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Tasks&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;synced_property_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;JU]K&amp;quot;
    }
  }
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Note that &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/rich-text#database-mention-type-object&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;database mentions&lt;/a&gt; in rich text will continue to reference the database, not the data source.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;step-3-migrate-database-endpoints-to-data-sources&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-step-3-migrate-database-endpoints-to-data-sources&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Step 3: Migrate database endpoints to data sources&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Step 3: Migrate database endpoints to data sources&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#step-3-migrate-database-endpoints-to-data-sources&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;p&gt;The next step is to migrate each existing use of database APIs to their new data source equivalents, taking into account the differences between the old &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;/v1/databases&lt;/code&gt; APIs and new &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;/v1/data_sources&lt;/code&gt; APIs:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Return very similar responses, but with &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;object: &amp;quot;data_source&amp;quot;&lt;/code&gt;, starting from &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025-09-03&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Accept a specific &lt;strong&gt;data source ID&lt;/strong&gt; in query, body, and path parameters, not a database ID&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Exist under the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;/v1/data_sources&lt;/code&gt; namespace, starting from version &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025-09-03&lt;/code&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Require a custom API request with &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;notion.request&lt;/code&gt; if you&amp;#x27;re using the TypeScript SDK, since we won&amp;#x27;t upgrade to SDK v5 until you get to Step 4 (below).&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;p&gt;The following APIs are affected. Each of them is covered by a sub-section below, with more specific Before vs. After explanations and code snippets:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;/reference/retrieve-a-database&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Retrieve a database&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;/reference/post-database-query&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Query a database&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;/reference/create-a-database&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Create a database&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;/reference/update-a-database&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Update a database&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;/reference/search&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Search&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;retrieve-database&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-retrieve-database&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Retrieve database&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Retrieve database&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#retrieve-database&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Before (2022-06-28):&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Retrieving a database with multiple data sources fails with a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;validation_error&lt;/code&gt; message.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;For relation properties&lt;/strong&gt;: across &lt;em&gt;all&lt;/em&gt; API versions, &lt;em&gt;both&lt;/em&gt; the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; are now included in the response object.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Retrieve Database (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Query Database (TS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Retrieve Database (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// GET /v1/databases/:database_id
{
  // ...
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Query Database (TS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;const response = await notion.databases.retrieve({
  database_id: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;,
  // ...
})
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;After (2025-09-03):&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;The Retrieve Database API is now repurposed to return a list of &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_sources&lt;/code&gt; (each with an &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;id&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;name&lt;/code&gt;, as described in Step 1).&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;The Retrieve &lt;em&gt;Data Source&lt;/em&gt; API is the new home for getting up-to-date information on the properties (schema) of each data source under a database.
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;The &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;object&lt;/code&gt; field is always &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&amp;quot;data_source&amp;quot;&lt;/code&gt; and the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;id&lt;/code&gt; is specific to the data source.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;The &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;parent&lt;/code&gt; object now identifies the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt; immediate parent of the data source.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;The database&amp;#x27;s parent (i.e. the data source&amp;#x27;s grandparent) is included as a separate field, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_parent&lt;/code&gt;, on the data source response.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;You can&amp;#x27;t use a database ID with the retrieve data source API, or vice-versa. The two types of IDs are not interchangeable.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Retrieve Data Source (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Retrieve Data Source (TS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Retrieve Data Source (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// Get `data_source_id` from Step 1
//
// GET /v1/data_sources/:data_source_id
{
  &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;data_source&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;bc1211ca-e3f1-4939-ae34-5260b16f627c&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;created_time&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-07-08T23:50:00.000Z&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;last_edited_time&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-07-08T23:50:00.000Z&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;properties&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;In stock&amp;quot;: {
      &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;fk%5EY&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;name&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;In stock&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;checkbox&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;checkbox&amp;quot;: {}
    },
    &amp;quot;Name&amp;quot;: {
      &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;title&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;name&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Name&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;title&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;title&amp;quot;: {}
    }
  },
  &amp;quot;parent&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;database_id&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;database_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;6ee911d9-189c-4844-93e8-260c1438b6e4&amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;quot;database_parent&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;98ad959b-2b6a-4774-80ee-00246fb0ea9b&amp;quot;
  },
  // ... (other properties omitted)
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Retrieve Data Source (TS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// Get dataSource from Step 1

const response = await notion.request({
  method: &amp;quot;get&amp;quot;,
  path: `data_sources/${dataSource.id}`,
  // ...
})

// After upgrading TS SDK:
const response = await notion.dataSources.retrieve({
  data_source_id: dataSource.id,
})
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;query-databases&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-query-databases&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Query databases&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Query databases&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#query-databases&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Before (2022-06-28):&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Query Database (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Query Database (TS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Query Database (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// PATCH /v1/databases/:database_id/query
{
  // ...
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Query Database (TS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;const response = await notion.databases.query({
  database_id: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;,
  // ...
})
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;After (2025-09-03):&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;When you update the API version, the path of this API changes, and now accepts a data source ID. With the TS SDK, you&amp;#x27;ll have to switch this to temporarily use a custom &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;notion.request(...)&lt;/code&gt;, until you upgrade to the next major version as part of Step 4.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Query Data Source (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Query Data Source (TS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Query Data Source (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// PATCH /v1/data_sources/:data_source_id/query
{
  // ...
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Query Data Source (TS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// Get dataSource from Step 1

const response = await notion.request({
  method: &amp;quot;post&amp;quot;,
  path: `data_sources/${dataSource.id}/query`,
  // ...
})

// After upgrading TS SDK:
const response = await notion.dataSources.query({
  data_source_id: dataSource.id,
  // ...
})
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;create-database&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-create-database&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Create database&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Create database&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#create-database&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Before (2022-06-28):&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;In &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2022-06-28&lt;/code&gt;, the Create Database API created a database and data source, along with its initial default view.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;For relation properties&lt;/strong&gt;: across &lt;em&gt;all&lt;/em&gt; API versions, &lt;em&gt;both&lt;/em&gt; the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; are now included in the response object.
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;When providing relation properties in a request, you can either use &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt;, or both, prior to making the API version upgrade.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;We recommend starting by switching your integration over to passing only a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; for relation objects even in &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2022-06-28&lt;/code&gt; to precisely identify the data source to use for the relation and be ready for the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025-09-03&lt;/code&gt; behavior.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Create Database (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Create Database (TS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Create Database (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// POST /v1/databases
{
  &amp;quot;parent&amp;quot;: {&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;, &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;},
  &amp;quot;properties&amp;quot;: {...},
  // ...
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Create Database (TS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;const response = await notion.databases.create({
  parent: {type: &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;, page_id: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;},
  properties: {...},
  // ...
})
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;After (2025-09-03):&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Continue to use the Create Database API even after upgrading, when you want to create both a database and its initial data source.
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;properties&lt;/code&gt; for the initial data source you&amp;#x27;re creating now go under &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;initial_data_source[properties]&lt;/code&gt; to better separate data source specific properties vs. ones that apply to the entire database.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Other parameters apply to the database and continue to be specified at the top-level when creating a database (&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;icon&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;cover&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;title&lt;/code&gt;).&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Only use the new Create Data Source API to add an additional data source (with a new set of &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;properties&lt;/code&gt;) to an existing database.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;For relation properties&lt;/strong&gt;: You can no longer provide a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt;. Notion continues to include both the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; in the &lt;em&gt;response&lt;/em&gt; for convenience, but the &lt;em&gt;request&lt;/em&gt; object must &lt;strong&gt;only contain &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Create Database with initial data source (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Create Database with initial data source (TS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Create Database with initial data source (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// POST /v1/databases
{
  &amp;quot;initial_data_source&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;properties&amp;quot;: {
      // ... (Data source properties behave the same as database properties previously)
    }
  },
  &amp;quot;parent&amp;quot;: {&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;workspace&amp;quot;, &amp;quot;workspace&amp;quot;: true} | {&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;, &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;},
  &amp;quot;title&amp;quot;: [...],
  &amp;quot;icon&amp;quot;: {&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;emoji&amp;quot;, &amp;quot;emoji&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;üöÄ&amp;quot;} | ...
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Create Database with initial data source (TS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;const response = await notion.request({
  method: &amp;quot;post&amp;quot;,
  path: &amp;quot;databases&amp;quot;,
  body: {
    initial_data_source: {
      properties: {
        // ... (Data source properties behave the same as database properties previously)
      }
    },
  },
  parent: {type: &amp;quot;workspace&amp;quot;, workspace: true} | {type: &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;, page_id: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;},
  title: [...],
  icon: {type: &amp;quot;emoji&amp;quot;, emoji: &amp;quot;üöÄ&amp;quot;} | ...
}
  
})

// After upgrading TS SDK:
const response = await notion.databases.create({
  data_source_id: dataSource.id,
})
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;update-database&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-update-database&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Update database&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Update database&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#update-database&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Before (2022-06-28):&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;In &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2022-06-28&lt;/code&gt;, the Update Database API was used to update attributes that related to both a database and its data source under the hood. For example, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;is_inline&lt;/code&gt; relates to the database, but &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;properties&lt;/code&gt; defines the schema of a specific data source.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;For relation properties&lt;/strong&gt;: across &lt;em&gt;all&lt;/em&gt; API versions, &lt;em&gt;both&lt;/em&gt; the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; are now included in the response object.
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;When providing relation properties in a request, you can either use &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt;, or both, prior to making the API version upgrade.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;We recommend starting by switching your integration over to passing only a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; for relation objects even in &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2022-06-28&lt;/code&gt; to precisely identify the data source to use for the relation and be ready for the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025-09-03&lt;/code&gt; behavior.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Update Database (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Update Database (TS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Update Database (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// PATCH /v1/databases/:database_id
{
  &amp;quot;icon&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;file_upload&amp;quot;: {&amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;}
  },
  &amp;quot;properties&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;Restocked (new)&amp;quot;: {
      &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;checkbox&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;checkbox&amp;quot;: {}
    },
    &amp;quot;In stock&amp;quot;: null
  },
  &amp;quot;title&amp;quot;: [{&amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {&amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;New Title&amp;quot;}}]
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Update Database (TS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;const response = await notion.databases.update({
  database_id: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;,
  icon: {file_upload: &amp;quot;...&amp;quot;},
  properties: {
    &amp;quot;Restocked (new)&amp;quot;: {
      type: &amp;quot;checkbox&amp;quot;,
      checkbox: {},
    },
    &amp;quot;In stock&amp;quot;: null,
  },
  title: [{text: {content: &amp;quot;New Title&amp;quot;}}],
})
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;After (2025-09-03):&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Continue to use the Update Database API for attributes that apply to the database: &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;parent&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;title&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;is_inline&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;icon&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;cover&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;in_trash&lt;/code&gt;.
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;parent&lt;/code&gt; can be used to move an existing database to a different page, or (for public integrations), to the workspace level as a private page. This is a new feature in Notion&amp;#x27;s API.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;cover&lt;/code&gt; is not supported when &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;is_inline&lt;/code&gt; is &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;true&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Switch over to the Update &lt;em&gt;Data Source&lt;/em&gt; API to modify attributes that apply to a specific data source: &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;properties&lt;/code&gt; (to change database schema), &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;in_trash&lt;/code&gt; (to archive or unarchive a specific data source under a database), &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;title&lt;/code&gt;.
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Changes to one data source&amp;#x27;s &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;properties&lt;/code&gt; doesn&amp;#x27;t affect the schema for other data source, even if they share a common database.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;For relation properties&lt;/strong&gt;: You can no longer provide a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt;. Notion continues to include both the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt; in the &lt;em&gt;response&lt;/em&gt; for convenience, but the &lt;em&gt;request&lt;/em&gt; object (to Update Data Source) must &lt;strong&gt;only contain &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;data_source_id&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/strong&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Example for updating a data source&amp;#x27;s title and properties (adding one new property and removing another):&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Update Data Source (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Update Data Source (TS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Update Data Source (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// PATCH /v1/data_sources/:data_source_id
{
  &amp;quot;properties&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;Restocked (new)&amp;quot;: {
      &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;checkbox&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;checkbox&amp;quot;: {}
    },
    &amp;quot;In stock&amp;quot;: null
  },
  &amp;quot;title&amp;quot;: [{&amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {&amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;New Title&amp;quot;}}]
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Update Data Source (TS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// Update data source properties and title using SDK version
// prior to v5 and setting `notionVersion` in the `Client` to
// &amp;quot;2025-09-03&amp;quot;:

const response = await notion.request({
  method: &amp;quot;patch&amp;quot;,
  path: `data_sources/${dataSource.id}`,
  data: {
    properties: {
      &amp;quot;Restocked (new)&amp;quot;: {
        type: &amp;quot;checkbox&amp;quot;,
        checkbox: {},
      },
      &amp;quot;In stock&amp;quot;: null
    },
  },
  title: [{text: {content: &amp;quot;New Title&amp;quot;}}],
})

// After upgrading TS SDK to v5:

const response = await notion.dataSources.update({
  properties: {
    &amp;quot;Restocked (new)&amp;quot;: {
      type: &amp;quot;checkbox&amp;quot;,
      checkbox: {},
    },
    &amp;quot;In stock&amp;quot;: null,
  },
  title: [{text: {content: &amp;quot;New Title&amp;quot;}}],
})
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Example for updating a database&amp;#x27;s parent (to move it), and switch it to be inline under the parent page:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Update Data Source (JSON)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;false&quot; class=&quot;&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Update Data Source (TS SDK)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Update Data Source (JSON)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;// PATCH /v1/databases/:database_id
{
  &amp;quot;parent&amp;quot;: {&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;, &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;NEW-PAGE-ID&amp;quot;},
  &amp;quot;is_inline&amp;quot;: true
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-typescript theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;typescript&quot; name=&quot;Update Data Source (TS SDK)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;const response = await notion.request({
  method: &amp;quot;patch&amp;quot;,
  path: `databases/${DATABASE_ID}`,
  body: {
    parent: {type: &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;, page_id: &amp;quot;NEW-PAGE-ID&amp;quot;},
    is_inline: true,
  }
})

// After upgrading TS SDK:
const response = await notion.dataSources.update({
  parent: {type: &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;, page_id: &amp;quot;NEW-PAGE-ID&amp;quot;},
  is_inline: true,
})
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;step-4-handle-search-results-with-data-sources&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-step-4-handle-search-results-with-data-sources&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Step 4: Handle search results with data sources&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Step 4: Handle search results with data sources&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#step-4-handle-search-results-with-data-sources&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Before (2022-06-28):&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;If any Notion users add a second data source to a database, existing integrations will not see any search results for that database.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;After (2025-09-03):&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;The &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/search&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Search&lt;/a&gt; API now only accepts &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;filter[&amp;quot;value&amp;quot;] = &amp;quot;page&amp;quot; | &amp;quot;data_source&amp;quot;&lt;/code&gt; instead of &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&amp;quot;page&amp;quot; | &amp;quot;database&amp;quot;&lt;/code&gt; when providing a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;filter[&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;] = &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;&lt;/code&gt;. Make sure to update the body parameters accordingly when upgrading to &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025-09-03&lt;/code&gt;.
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Currently, the search behavior remains the same. The provided query is matched against the &lt;em&gt;database&lt;/em&gt; title, not the &lt;em&gt;data source&lt;/em&gt; title.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Similarly, the search API &lt;em&gt;response&lt;/em&gt; returns data source IDs &amp;amp; objects.
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Aside from the IDs and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;object: &amp;quot;data_source&amp;quot;&lt;/code&gt; in these entries, the rest of the object shape of search is unchanged.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Since results operate at the data source level, they continue to include &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;properties&lt;/code&gt; (database schema) as before.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;If there are multiple data sources, all of them are included in the search response. Each of them will have a different data source ID.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;step-5-upgrade-sdk-if-applicable&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-step-5-upgrade-sdk-if-applicable&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Step 5: Upgrade SDK (if applicable)&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Step 5: Upgrade SDK (if applicable)&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#step-5-upgrade-sdk-if-applicable&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;blockquote class=&quot;callout callout_info&quot; theme=&quot;üìò&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=&quot;callout-heading&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;callout-icon&quot;&gt;üìò&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;Introducing &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;@notionhq/client&lt;/code&gt; v5&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p&gt;v5 of the SDK is now available:&lt;/p&gt;&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://www.npmjs.com/package/@notionhq/client/v/5.0.0&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;NPM link&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/makenotion/notion-sdk-js/releases/tag/v5.0.0&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;GitHub release link&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;p&gt;If you see an even newer version (e.g. &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;v5.0.2&lt;/code&gt;) at the time you&amp;#x27;re following these steps, we recommend upgrading directly to the latest version to unlock more enhancements and bugfixes, making the upgrade smoother.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;
&lt;p&gt;If you&amp;#x27;re using &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/makenotion/notion-sdk-js&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Notion&amp;#x27;s TypeScript SDK&lt;/a&gt;, and have completed all of the steps above to rework your usage of Notion&amp;#x27;s endpoints to fit the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025-09-03&lt;/code&gt; suite of endpoints manually, we recommend completing the migration by upgrading to the next &lt;a href=&quot;https://github.com/makenotion/notion-sdk-js/releases&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;major version release&lt;/a&gt;, v5.0.0, via your &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;package.json&lt;/code&gt; file (or other version management toolchain.)&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;The code snippets under Step 3 include the relevant syntax for the new &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;notion.dataSources.*&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;notion.databases.*&lt;/code&gt; methods to assist in your upgrade. Go through each area where you used a manual &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;notion.request(...)&lt;/code&gt; call, and switch it over to use one of the dedicated methods. Make sure you&amp;#x27;re setting the Notion version at initialization time to &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025-09-03&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Note that the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/get-databases&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;List databases (deprecated)&lt;/a&gt; endpoint, which has been removed since version &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2022-02-22&lt;/code&gt;, is no longer included as of v5 of the SDK.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;step-6-upgrade-webhooks-if-applicable&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-step-6-upgrade-webhooks-if-applicable&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Step 6: Upgrade webhooks (if applicable)&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Step 6: Upgrade webhooks (if applicable)&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#step-6-upgrade-webhooks-if-applicable&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;introducing-webhook-versioning&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-introducing-webhook-versioning&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Introducing webhook versioning&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Introducing webhook versioning&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#introducing-webhook-versioning&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;When creating, editing, or viewing an &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/webhooks&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;integration webhook subscription&lt;/a&gt; in Notion&amp;#x27;s integration settings, there&amp;#x27;s a new option to set the &lt;strong&gt;API version&lt;/strong&gt; that applies to events delivered to your webhook URL:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;figure&gt;&lt;span aria-label=&quot;Screenshot of the integration webhook &amp;quot;Edit subscription&amp;quot; form, with the new &amp;quot;API version&amp;quot; dropdown menu.&quot; class=&quot;img lightbox closed&quot; role=&quot;button&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;lightbox-inner&quot;&gt;&lt;img alt=&quot;Screenshot of the integration webhook &amp;quot;Edit subscription&amp;quot; form, with the new &amp;quot;API version&amp;quot; dropdown menu.&quot; loading=&quot;lazy&quot; src=&quot;https://files.readme.io/dea8af87f7abbb9f51a0cce55aa59a6087fb3641376471a2168d4636c84f8a9e-image.png&quot; align=&quot;center&quot; class=&quot;border&quot; caption=&quot;&quot; height=&quot;auto&quot; title=&quot;&quot; width=&quot;auto&quot;/&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;figcaption&gt;&lt;p&gt;Screenshot of the integration webhook &amp;quot;Edit subscription&amp;quot; form, with the new &amp;quot;API version&amp;quot; dropdown menu.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/figcaption&gt;&lt;/figure&gt;
&lt;p&gt;For new webhook endpoints, we recommend starting with the most recent version. For existing webhook subscriptions, you&amp;#x27;ll need to carefully introduce support for the added and changed webhook types. Ensure your webhook handler can accept &lt;em&gt;both&lt;/em&gt; old &amp;amp; new event payloads before using the &amp;quot;&lt;strong&gt;Edit subscription&lt;/strong&gt;&amp;quot; form to upgrade to the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2025-09-03&lt;/code&gt; API version.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;After you&amp;#x27;ve tested your webhook endpoint to ensure the new events are being handled correctly for some period of time (for example, a few hours), you can clean up your system to only expect events with the updated shape.
